comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Enrique Granados Campiña (27 July 1867 – 24 March 1916) was a Spanish pianist and composer of classical music." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enrique_Granados He and his wife died when a German U-boat sank the passenger ferry Sussex in the English Channel. "Andrés Perelló de Segurola (27 March 1874 - 23 January 1953) was a Spanish operatic bass who performed as Andrés de Segurola. [...] He was a member of Metropolitan Opera Company between 1901 and 1920 and later appeared in many films." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andr%C3%A9s_de_Segurola See notes under

comment._content: Thank you for your research artolog. We'll fill in the caption in the records for both images the next time we update.
